refnamediv.refpurpose: make a Samba share read only for a specified time period

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: This VFS module is part of the samba 7 suite.

The vfs_readonly VFS module marks a share as read only for all clients connecting within the configured time period. Clients connecting during this time will be denied write access to all files in the share, irrespective of their actual access privileges.

listitem.para: Only mark the share as read only if the client connection was made between the times marked by the BEGIN and END date specifiers. The syntax of these date specifiers is the same as that accepted by the -d option of GNU date 1.
